author: esammer
msg: - Output the last line of each file when testing the RollingFileSink.

author: esammer
msg: - Created an EventFormatter interface from TextDelimitedOutputFormatter.
Avoid NPE when stringifying an event with a null body.

author: esammer
msg: - Force a flush upon rolling a file in the RollingFileSink (generally not necessary, but makes
sense to be explicit when talking about durability).

author: djencks
msg: KARAF-424 much better way to get legal files into assemblies.  This makes the assembly mojo add all project resources, and configures the resources for each server
